vulnerable.commit_message:
Calcualte max nspace declarations correctly for XML writer

(raptor_xml_writer_start_element_common): Calculate max including for
each attribute a potential name and value.

Fixes Issues #0000617 http://bugs.librdf.org/mantis/view.php?id=617
and #0000618 http://bugs.librdf.org/mantis/view.php?id=618
vulnerable.cve_desc: raptor_xml_writer_start_element_common in raptor_xml_writer.c in Raptor RDF Syntax Library 2.0.15 miscalculates the maximum nspace declarations for the XML writer, leading to heap-based buffer overflows (sometimes seen in raptor_qname_format_as_xml).
